body:
### Before
```
$ spack configure xz
==> Checking dependencies for ['xz']
```
```
$ spack configure xz cflags=-O2
==> Checking dependencies for ['xz', 'cflags=-O2']
```

### After

```
$ spack configure xz cflags=-O2
==> Checking dependencies for xz
```
title: Fix spack configure output
